import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { X, Users, Settings, Activity, FileText, Shield, BarChart3, BookOpen, Brain } from 'lucide-react'; import { Button } from './ui/Button'; import { Card } from './ui/Card'; import { Tabs } from './ui/Tabs'; import { Badge } from './ui/Badge'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { AdminDashboardGuard, SystemLogsGuard, UserManagementGuard } from './auth/RoleGuard'; import { adminService } from '../services/adminService'; import AdminDocumentation from './admin/AdminDocumentation'; import AIInsightsDashboard from './analytics/AIInsightsDashboard'; import { createLogger } from '../utils/logger'; interface SystemDashboardProps { onClose: () => void; } const logger = createLogger('SystemDashboard'); export const SystemDashboard: React.FC = ({ onClose }) => { const { currentUser, isAdmin } = useAuth(); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ uptime: '99.9%', response: '150ms', status: 'healthy' as 'healthy' | 'degraded' | 'down', totalUsers: 42, activeUsers: 15, totalProjects: 128, projectsToday: 7 }); useEffect(() => { // Set current user in admin service for permission checking adminService.setCurrentUser(currentUser?.email || null); logger.info('SystemDashboard opened', { userId: currentUser?.uid, userRole: currentUser?.role, isAdmin, adminServiceConfigured: adminService.getAccessStats().isConfigured }); }, [currentUser, isAdmin]); const renderOverviewTab = () => (
{/* System Status Cards */}

Status

Sistema Online

Uptime

{stats.uptime}

Resposta

{stats.response}

Vers√£o

v2.1.3
{/* Services Status */}

Servi√ßos Ativos

Gemini AI ‚úì Ativo
Firebase Auth ‚úì Ativo
Microsoft Clarity ‚úì Ativo
AI Analytics ‚úì Ativo
Analytics ‚úì Ativo
PWA Service ‚úì Ativo
Tally Forms ‚úì Ativo
Performance Monitor ‚úì Ativo
); const renderDocumentationTab = () => (

Documenta√ß√£o Administrativa

Voc√™ precisa de permiss√µes de administrador para acessar a documenta√ß√£o metodol√≥gica.

} > ); const renderAIAnalyticsTab = () => (

AI Analytics

Voc√™ precisa de permiss√µes de administrador para acessar insights de AI Analytics.

} > ); const renderAdminTab = () => (

Acesso Restrito

Voc√™ precisa de permiss√µes de administrador para ver esta se√ß√£o.

} >
{/* User Stats */}

Usu√°rios

{stats.totalUsers}

Total cadastrados

Ativos Agora

{stats.activeUsers}

Online agora

Projetos

{stats.totalProjects}

Total criados

Hoje

{stats.projectsToday}

Projetos hoje
{/* Admin Actions */}

A√ß√µes Administrativas

); const tabs = [ { id: 'overview', label: 'Vis√£o Geral', icon: Activity }, ...(isAdmin ? [ { id: 'admin', label: 'Administra√ß√£o', icon: Shield }, { id: 'ai-analytics', label: 'AI Analytics', icon: Brain }, { id: 'documentation', label: 'Documenta√ß√£o', icon: BookOpen } ] : []), ]; return (
{/* Header */}

Dashboard do Sistema

{isAdmin ? 'Painel administrativo completo com AI Analytics' : 'Monitoramento b√°sico do sistema'}

{/* User Info */} {currentUser && (

{currentUser.displayName || currentUser.email}

Role: {currentUser.role}

)} {/* Tabs */}
{tabs.map((tab) => ( ))}
{/* Tab Content */}
{activeTab === 'overview' && renderOverviewTab()} {activeTab === 'admin' && renderAdminTab()} {activeTab === 'ai-analytics' && renderAIAnalyticsTab()} {activeTab === 'documentation' && renderDocumentationTab()}
); };
